Item.text: _user_ If you are having trouble reading the passage, then you can read along with the audio, All you have to do is press the read audio button
Item.speech: _user_ If you are having trouble reading the passage, then you can read along with the audio, by pressing the read audio button

Item.text: _user_ and Jordan, Welcome back. # How are you? # Today we will be helping Jordan with some new documents.
Cristina, I don't know much about documents. # How do I know if something I am reading is a document?

Jordan, I thought you would never ask. # A document is a piece of written, printed, or electronic matter that provides information, evidence, or serves as an official record. # I think we should look at a couple of examples before we get started on today's activity.
Ok I think I get it. # So a document kind of keeps track of information, like a written record of some sort.

That's right. # There are a few key things to remember about documents. # First, documents provide information, this example utility bill gives information about how much energy was used over the course of a payment period. # Second, the purpose of documents is to inform. # It informs us about the date that an action must be performed. # Some documents require action to be taken. # In this case, the action is the payment due August fifteenth. # The total amount due shows how much needs to be paid by that date.
What about this receipt? # I feel like a receipt provides information and is informative, but it doesn't require an action.

That's true Jordan. # Not all documents will require action. # This example shows a receipt. # A receipt informs you about items that were purchased. # Its purpose is to help you remember by giving a record of when, where and what items were purchased as well as how the items were purchased.

One more question. # What about documents we fill out, like on the computer? # I ordered a swimsuit through the internet and i had to fill out a bunch of information, like my shorts size and my address.

Right. # The point of filling out documents is usually to give information to other people. # In your case, the person sending you the swimsuit needed to know and what size of suit to send and where to send it.

OK, I get it. # From what you have said, I think a resume would be a type of document. # I just finished my first resume. # I found a job listing that I really want to apply for but I want to make sure that I did my resume correctly first. # _user_, will you look over it with me?

Great idea, Jordan. # A resume is a very important type of document. # It gives information to potential employers about your skills and experience. # _user_, could you help Jordan out? # Please read over Jordan's resume and press continue at the bottom of the page to move on to the rest of the activity.
Let's keep practicing.
_user_, thanks so much for all your help! # I learned a lot from you. # I was wondering if you could help me with one more document?
_user_, yes, let's take a look at this document for Jordan. # When you are done, please press continue at the bottom.
I am learning a lot today!
Let's go to the next question.
I hope you learned more about documents and the important pieces needed to read, complete, and them. # Jordan, I hope you can get your documents in order now.
I think I can, yes. # _user_ you really helped me today! # Thank you so much! # See you next time.
Let's keep going you two.
Alright. # Let's move on.

Question.text: _user_, can I first ask you, what is the purpose of a resume?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: The purpose of this document is to provide a summary of skills, abilities, and accomplishments.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Here's a hint, you want to effectively communicate what makes you best for the job. # Unless your hobbies are related to the job, a resume should not describe your hobbies. # Please try again.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: I'm cleared up on what the purpose of a resume is now. # So it's not to get a date. # I guess i can use the Internet for that. # Thanks.

Question.text: _user_, based on my resume, which job position do you think would best fit my work experience?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: While Jordan can certainly apply for any of these positions, his resume best reflects his experience as a sever. # The best choice here is fine dining server.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Please read carefully under Jordan's experience section. # Try again.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: Great! # I was thinking maybe a fine dining server best suits my experience too!

Question.text: _user_, which section on this resume do you think I should put my goals? # Choose one of the highlighted sections, either objective, core qualifications, or experience.

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: Jordan's goals are best reflected in the Objective section of the resume. # The purpose here is to tell a potential employer what it is you want to do.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Here's a clue, we are looking for where Jordan lists what he wants to do. # Please try again.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: I will remember that objective is where I need to summarize my goals. # Thanks.

Question.text: _user_, could you help Jordan fill in the objective for his resume? # He needs to fill in the blank with an appropriate word or phrase. # Please type your answer in the box below.

Answer.name: GoodAnswer
Answer.text: The best answer is server. # According to Jordan's brief description of his past work experience, he has the most experience as a server.

Answer.name: BadAnswer
Answer.text: A better answer could be something like server, waiter, or staff.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: I will remember to put server down in there.

Answer.name: GoodAnswer
Answer.test: chelsea jones | (RegEx=1, LSA=0.502) chalsy jones | (RegEx=1, LSA=0.135)

Hint.text: Remember, we are look for the kind of job Jordan would like to get. # Type the best answer below.

Answer.name: BadAnswer
Answer.text: Oh that isn't quite what I was looking for. # The best answer would be something like server or waiter.

Question.text: _user_, What do you think about the email address that I provided, should I change to a different one to look more professional and easier for people to remember?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: jordan dot smith 03 at c net dot com is the best email to use. # It is best to avoid email addresses with your nickname, hobby, pet's name or any other personal information besides your name.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: A good rule of thumb is not to use your nickname or hobby in the address. # Why don't you give it another try?

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: Yeah, I think having my name in the email address makes perfect sense.

Question.text: _user_, I want to mention that I have some experience with graphic design, which section do you think I should put that down? # Please select one of the highlighted sections.

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: Any skill should be in the core qualification section, even if they are not directly relevant to the job Jordan will apply for, just in case they end up being important.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Here's a hint: which section lists Jordan's skills?

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: I see. # So skills should be in the core qualification section, and work experience that's directly related to the job I'm applying for will be in the experience section, got it!

Question.text: _user_, I'm thinking maybe I shouldn't be putting all of my skills on this resume, just the relevant ones, which of these skills do you think I should just leave out? # Can you select one of the highlighted skills that you think i should remove?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: the best answer is exceptional video gaming abilities. # Though Jordan does have these skills, they are not the same type of skills as the restaurant and customer service oriented ones in this section. # The other skills listed are much more relevant to a serving job.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: A good thing to consider for this question is what do the other skills have in common. # How will they relate to his objective? # Let's give it one more try. # Which does not fit? # Choose one of the highlighted answers.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: I'm actually quite proud of my video game talent, but yeah maybe I should just leave it out. # I will think about it.

Question.text: Which highlighted Core Qualification does not fit with Jordan's other skills?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: The best answer is exceptional video gaming abilities. # Though Jordan does have these skills, they are not the same type of skills as the restaurant and customer service oriented ones in this section. # The others listed are much more relevant to a serving job.

Answer.name: BlankPrompt
Answer.text: Please select an answer

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: I think there is a better answer. # Think about the types of skills Jordan has listed in this section, which one is least like the others?

Answer.name: AskJordan
Answer.text: Jordan, you listed many skills in this section? # Which of these you listed isn't really like the others?

Answer.name: AskUser
Answer.text: What do you think is the best answer?

Answer.name: JordanCorrect
Answer.text: I would have to say my exceptional video gaming abilities.

Answer.name: JordanIncorrect
Answer.text: I made this resume but it beats me!

Answer.name: AgreeswithUser
Answer.text: _user_, I think that you're dead on!

Question.text: Now let's look at the experience section, Jordan has listed washing as a task he completed at his previous position with Clark's Restaurant. # Let us clarify this, according to his resume, what kind of washing has Jordan had experiences in? # Please try typing in an answer that makes sense.

Answer.name: GoodAnswer
Answer.text: Jordan's experience lists his work as a dishwasher. # That is the best answer.

Answer.name: BadAnswer
Answer.text: Since Jordan has served in a restaurant, washing dishes would be the most reasonable interpretation.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: I guess I should clarify this. # Just putting down washing may be rather vague. # Thanks

Answer.name: GoodAnswer
Answer.test: chelsea jones | (RegEx=1, LSA=0.502) chalsy jones | (RegEx=1, LSA=0.135)

Hint.text: Think about what kind of washing Jordan could do in a restaurant. # What do you think the best answer might be? # Try typing in your answer again.

Question.text: _user_, should I include all of the following in my resume? # Could you tell me which one I should maybe leave out?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: It is acceptable to list hobbies if they are relevant to the job you're applying for. # And contact information is necessary for potential employers to get in touch with you. # But religious affiliations is rather personal, it's best to leave that one out if it's not directly relevant.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Here's a hint, which one of these is considered more personal or private than the others? # Please try again.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: Yes I'm not really that shy about my religious affiliations, but I can see why it's probably best to leave that one out.

Question.text: _user_, I just got this in my mail, can you tell me what kind of document is this?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: This is a credit card statement with the amount of money that Jordan owes.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Here's a hint, there are dollar amounts on there and itemized activity, what type of document best fit these?

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: Got it! # I always get these confused with my car insurance for some reason.

Question.text: _user_, can you remind me what is the purpose of a credit card statement?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: This document is intended to give a record of purchases and payments. # It gives the card holder a summary of how much the card has been used during the billing period, as well as the amount that is due for that billing cycle.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Think about why you would need a statement for bills, please try again.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: Yes now that I think about it, having an itemized record is very helpful, even if it's quite annoying to always get these in the mail.

Question.text: _user_, I guess I need to pay my bill now. # Which of the highlighted dates tells me when my payment is due?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: Jordan should refer to the section titled account information. # Here we can find the payment due date. # This shows Jordan will need to pay his bill by November 23rd.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Be careful, Jordan is asking for a specific date when his payment would be due, please try again.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: Got it. # For some reason I always thought the due date should be under payment information, but I guess now I know the correct place to look for due dates, thanks again.

Question.text: _user_, can you tell me how much money I have left on this credit card to spend? # Would it be the amount next to new purchases, credit line, or credit available? # Please choose one for me.

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: The credit available line shows the amount Jordan currently has available on his credit card to spend on his card. # His credit available is one ninety five dollars and eight cents. # And that's the maximum amount he can spend on this card right now.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Remember, we are looking for the amount Jordan still has that he can spend. # Please try again.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: I always confuse this with the other two, but now I think I get it. # New purchases are what I have spent so far, and credit line is what I can spend total. # The amount I have left to spend would be credit line subtracting new purchases which would be one ninety five and eight cents, got it.

Question.text: _user_, I'm checking my bill now, can you point out to me which day I did the most spending? # please choose one for me.

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: Jordan's largest purchase was at Grocery World on October 20th. # We can find this information by comparing the amounts of the other purchases in this section. # He spent a total of fifty dollars and thirty two cents on that date.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Please try to compare the different amounts and choose the largest one. # Try again.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: yeah I think I may have over spent a little on that day. # Thanks I needed to check that.

Question.text: _user_, I also remembered that I might need to pay some interest for my cash advances, can you show me where I can locate my interest rate for that?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: We can refer to finance charge summary to locate Jordan's interest rate. # If we look at the other sections, there is no other place that outlines interest rates for cash advances.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Here's a hint, interest rates are in percentages, please try again.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: Yes it is a bummer that it doesn't specifically say interest rate on there, just rate so it's confusing. # But I will remember that rates would be in percentages and look for that section.

Question.text: _user_, can you then let me know how much interest I would need to pay on my cash advances annually?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: If we look at the same finance charge summary as in the previous question, and find the annual percentage rate on the second column, we find that the interest Jordan will actually pay is 11. # 28 percent.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Jordan needs to know the annual rate he would need to pay, look carefully and try again.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: Wow my percentage rate seems higher than I previously thought. # Good thing that I checked!

Question.text: _user_, I heard from my credit card company that I don't need to pay the full amount but just the minimum amount, can you tell me what is minimum amount that I would need to pay?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: If you refer back to payment information or the balance summary, you will find that Jordan will need to pay a minimum amount of eighteen dollars. # This is listed next to minimum amount due.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Be careful to look for the minimum amount due for Jordan. # Please try again.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: Oh I just found out that although I won't be charged if I just pay that eighteen dollars, my interest would go up if I don't pay the full amount. # These credit cards companies are tricky! # You would end up owing them quite a lot of money if you are not careful! # Thanks for helping me out again.

Question.text: _user_, I just got this document in my mail, can you tell me what the purpose of it is?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: This document intends to show who is a part of the contract and what it is for. # In this case, it is for a rental agreement.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Look for keywords in the document for its purpose, please try again.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: Ah, so a rental agreement will lay out every contracted agreement between the landlord and the renter, this would be very informative.

Question.text: _user_, can you tell me, based on this rental agreement, how long can my buddy Nicholas and I rent this house?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: Jordan and Nicholas are renting this property for one year. # We can find this information in the first paragraph of the document. # Their arrangement will begin in November 2019 and end in November 2019,

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Here's a hint, look under terms and try to find the date and deduce the length of rent from there. # Please try again.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: Ah I see now, we are renting per month for 12 months, that's one year. # I will keep that in mind.

Question.text: _user_, can you let me know who the land lord is? # Please choose a name so I can see, thanks.

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: Oscar Miller is the owner of the house and in turn this makes him the landlord. # The first sentence of this document outlines the roles of all the persons involved in this agreement.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Try searching for the keyword of land lord and find the name from there. # Please try again.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: Okay, Oscar Miller, I wrote that in my notebook.

Question.text: _user_, I called Mr. # Miller and he told me that I would have to pay a total of 1300 for the first month, I didn't get his explanation but he said to look for it in the rental agreement. # Can you tell me why I have to pay such a big amount? # I thought I only had to pay six hundred and fifty.

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: They have to pay a security deposit of six hundred and fifty dollars plus the first month's rent of six hundred and fifty dollars, which totals to thirteen hundred dollars. # If we refer to section two labeled payments, we can find this information.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Here's a hint, try look for the section that talks about payments. # It should explain the amounts. # Please try again.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: Wow that's a lot. # I hope I get that deposit back eventually, because I may be short on money for this.

Question.text: Mr. # Miller said something about warning me not to give him a bad check. # _user_, what does this rental agreement say will happen if i give him a bad check? # Choose an answer below.

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: As stated under section three on late charge, Mr. Miller will handle a bad check as unpaid rent. And he would charge Jordan with additional twenty five dollars fee for the bad check.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Here's a hint, look for the section on any additional charges that Jordan could potentially run into. # Please try again.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: That's harsh, I will be sure to check my bank balance that I have enough money for the check.

Question.text: _user_, I don't know if I can get enough money in time, do you know what would happens neither one of us can pay the rent by the fifth day of the month?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: According to the section on late charges, failing to pay by the time stated would result in a late fee of thirty two dollars and fifty cents, which will be added to rent.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Please try to look at the section on late charges, read it carefully and please try again.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: Geez, I will have to talk to my buddy Nick about getting that payment in on time.

Question.text: _user_, I'm thinking maybe I can find a third housemate to split up the rent, can you tell me if the rental agreement said anything about more than two people living in the house, and if so what does it say?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: According to the section labeled occupants, Jordan and Nicholas can have more than two people living with them but only if it does not exceed 15 days,

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Here's a hint, take a look at the section labeled occupants. # Please try again.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: That might work but I will have to talk to that third person about moving in temporarily and just pay his share of the rent for fifteen days. # Thanks for letting me know.

Question.text: _user_, now I have to think about other fees for renting this house, do you know what services are included in the rent, does it pay utilities by any chance?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: In section nine on property maintenance, it states that the landlord will provide paid maintenance and repair. # In section four, utilities, it states that the tenants are responsible for paying the utilities and for the trash pickup.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Look at the section on utilities, read it carefully and try again.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: I see, what a bummer. # But at least the landlord is willing to pay for repairs. # That would really be unfortunate if we had to pay for that too!

Question.text: _user_, what about pets? # I do have a pet gold fish, can I keep him or is there a fee for that too?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: In section six on pets, Jordan will be able to keep his pet fish if he obtain a written consent from the Mr. # Miller the owner. # And he would also need to pay an additional two hundred and fifty dollars deposit. # And an extra twenty five dollars will also be added to his rent each month.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Look at the section on pet ownership. # Read it carefully and please try again.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: I'm beginning to regret finding this place now. # Maybe we will have to look elsewhere if it's not too late. # Or I will have to give my gold fish away.

Question.text: _user_, my buddy Nick just called and he asks if we can make any changes to the house, can you let me know?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: According to section nine on alterations, no changes can be made to this house without consent. # Jordan and Nicholas will need permission from Mr. # Miller to change anything from the yard and landscaping to just painting the walls.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Look at section nine. # Read it carefully and try again.

Answer.name: JordanUnderstand
Answer.text: I see, that makes sense, I will let him know. # Thanks again.
